You are here: SALESFORCE HELP
Authorize Payment for Auto Claims with OS License

Claim approvers, claim handlers, and claim adjusters are assigned a maximum limit that they can authorize a claim payment for. If the claim amount exceeds the authorized limit, the claim needs approval by a claim manager before it can be paid.

Navigate to the Financials tab of the claim record.
Create a new loss item or expense item.
Select coverages and enter details.
The Adjusted Amount is automatically calculated by the workflow.
Pay an individual item or multiple items at once.
Any amount exceeding user authority is sent for approval and changes status to Pending Authority.
Approver receives email with link to approve, deny, or reassign.
After approval, status changes to Authority Approved. Click Pay.
Status changes to paid.

Understand the workflow for payment authorization and claim users' authorities.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Authorization Process for Auto Insurance Claims
